items.name: Jade Blade of the Great Fleet
items.description: The wielder of this weapon gains +1 Strength and the Regeneration (5+) special rule.

items.name: Nuku Cho's Crossbow
items.description: Repeater crossbow. Range 24" Strength 3. Multiple Shots (6), Rapid Fire.

items.name: Silver Moon Bow
items.description: Bow. Range 30" Strength 4. Armour Piercing (3), Multiple Shots (3).

items.name: Spirit Longma Spear
items.description: Light lance/spear. The wielder of this weapon gains the Ignores Armour saves special rule.

items.name: Vorpal Shard
items.description: The wielder of this weapon always Wounds on a 2+.

items.name: The Brazen Blade
items.description: This weapon has the Multiple Wounds (2) special rule. In addition, Ward saves (except Dodge and Parry) cannot be taken against Wounds caused by it.

items.name: Dawn Glaive
items.description: Polearm. All enemy attacks against the wielder of this weapon suffer -1 To Hit in close combat.

items.name: The Sword of Reason
items.description: Great weapon. This weapon has the Killing Blow special rules, which takes effect on a 5+ rather than a 6.

items.name: Ascendant Celestial Blade
items.description: Celestial Blade. The wielder of this weapon gains +1 Strength.

items.name: Blade of Xen Wu
items.description: The wielder of this weapon gains +1 Strength and +1 Attack. However, any unit joined by them cannot use their Leadership.

items.name: Serpent Fang
items.description: The wielder of this weapon gains the Armour Piercing (2) and Poisoned Attacks special rules.

items.name: Sword of Nan-Gau
items.description: The wielder of this weapon gains the Armour Piercing (3) and Hatred (Chaos) special rules.

items.name: Vermillion Blade
items.description: The wielder of this weapon gains +1 To Hit and the Flaming Attacks special rule.

items.name: Sun & Moon Blades
items.description: Two hand weapons. These weapons have the Armour Piercing (1) and Immunity (Killing Blow) special rules.

items.name: Wrath of Xen Yang
items.description: Light lance/spear. The wielder of this weapon gains the Flaming Attacks special rule.

items.name: Jade Armour of Beichai
items.description: Heavy armour. The wearer of this armour gains a 5+ Ward save and the Magic Resistance (2) special rule.

items.name: Quicksilver Armour
items.description: Medium armour. The wearer of this armour gains the Always Strikes First special rule.

items.name: Armour of the Warbird
items.description: Infantry only. Medium armour. The wearer of this armour gains the Fly (10) and Loner special rules.

items.name: Scales of the Celestial Court
items.description: Medium armour. The wearer of this armour gains the Natural Armour (3+) and Strider special rules.

items.name: Ascendant Celestial Armour
items.description: Heavy armour. The wearer of this armour is immune to penalties to any of their characteristics and automatically passes all characteristics tests.

items.name: Laminate Shield
items.description: Shield. Every time the bearer of this shield makes a successful Parry save, they may immediately make an additional Attack back against the model that struck the blow.

items.name: Mantle of Heaven
items.description: The wearer of this armour gains a 5+ armour save against non-magical missile attacks.

items.name: Shield of Nan-Gau
items.description: Shield. The bearer gains +2 armour save against all attacks to their front in the first round of close combat.

items.name: Guardian Feng Shi Bo
items.description: All close combat and missile attacks targeting the bearer of this item must re-roll successful To Hit rolls.

items.name: Robes of Shang Yang
items.description: Bound Spell (power level 3). This item contains the Wall of Wind & Fire spell from the Lore of Yang. In addition, the bearer gain a 6+ Ward save against missile attacks.

items.name: Crystal of Kunlan
items.description: The bearer of this item gains a 5+ Ward save. In addition, for each successful Ward save they make in close combat, the enemy that struck the blow immediately suffers a Strength 3 Hit with the Flaming Attacks special rule.

items.name: Celestial Silk Robe
items.description: The wearer of this item gains a 6+ Ward save and the Magical Resistance (1) special rule.

items.name: Jet Amulet
items.description: The bearer of this item gains the Magic Resistance (2) special rule. In addition, they may re-roll any failed dispel attempts against spells directly targeting them or their unit.

items.name: Jade Blood Pendant
items.description: Whenever the bearer kills one or more enemy models in close combat, roll a D6 at the end of the Close Combat phase. On the roll of a 5+, the bearer recovers a single Wound lost earlier in the battle.

items.name: Jar of All Souls
items.description: One use only. If the bearer of this item is killed, immediately roll a D6. On a 2+, they come back to life with 1 Wound remaining.

items.name: Crown of Jade
items.description: The bearer of this item gains a 4+ Ward save against all enemy spells.

items.name: Sigil of Smoke & Powder
items.description: All missile attacks targeting the bearer of this item or any unit they are with suffer -1 To Hit.

items.name: Cloak of Po Mei
items.description: The bearer of this item gains a +1 casting and dispelling bonus.

items.name: Clockwork Compass
items.description: One use only. This item can be used at the start of any of your Magic phases. Once used, all Remains in Play spells within 24" of the bearer that are currently in play are automatically dispelled, and the effects of all other spells within 24" of the bearer immediately come to an end.

items.name: Jade Amulet
items.description: The bearer of this item may re-roll failed channelling attempts.

items.name: Scrolls of Astromancy
items.description: Astromancer only. The bearer can re-roll all of the dice rolled to cast or dispel a spell once per Magic phase.

items.name: Staff of Wu Xing
items.description: The bearer of this staff can choose to re-roll all the Winds of Magic dice each Magic phase.

items.name: Scrolls of Wei-Jin
items.description: The bearer of this item may choose their spells from two different Lores of Magic from those normally available to them.

items.name: Maw Shard
items.description: One use only. The Maw Shard may be used in any of your Magic phases. Once used, any double (except double 1's) rolled when the bearer casts spells counts towards Ultimate Power this turn.

items.name: Seal of Xing Po
items.description: Dragon-Blooded Shugengan or Dragon Descendant only. The bearer of this item may choose spells from both the Lore of Yin and Yang in addition to the spells from their other lore.

items.name: Alchemist's Mask
items.description: Bound spell (power level 5). This item contains the Transmutation of Lead spell (see the Lore of Metal).

items.name: Icon of the Spirit Dragon
items.description: Bound spell (power level 5). This item contains the Ancestral Warriors spell (see the Lore of Yin).

items.name: Kite of the Uttermost Airs
items.description: The bearer can use this item in the Shooting phase. Choose one enemy unit with the Fly special rule within 12" that is not in close combat; they suffer D6 Strength 4 automatic Hits.

items.name: Cleansing Water
items.description: The bearer of this item and unit they join gains the Mighty Blow (1) special rule in turns that they charge.

items.name: Crackleblaze
items.description: One use only. This item can be used in the Shooting phase. Place the small 3" template with the hole anywhere within 6". It scatters D3". Any model under the template suffer a Strength 4 hits with the Flaming Attacks and Ignores Armour saves special rule.

items.name: Spirit Lantern
items.description: The bearer of this item gains the Terror special rule. In addition, they may re-roll To Wound rolls of 1 against Daemons, Undead and Vampires.

items.name: Catalytic Kiln
items.description: All enemy models in base contact with the bearer of this item suffer a Strength 3 Hit with the Flaming Attacks special rule at the start of each close combat phase. Models with Immunity (Flaming Attacks) suffer a Strength 2 Hit.

items.name: Astromancer's Spyglass
items.description: The bearer of this item gives you +1 to choose which side of the table to deploy on, choosing the first turn and rolling for Ambushers to arrive. In addition, all enemy units within 30" must reveal all Hidden models and magic items they might have.

items.name: Fan of the Magister
items.description: Lord Magistrate or Magistrate only. The bearer of this item allows friendly units to re-roll failed Leadership tests when attempting to use the Tactician special rule. In addition, enemy units within 12" must re-roll successful tests to march, redirect, restrain from pursuit and reform.

items.name: Fires of Nan-Gau
items.description: One use only. The bearer of this item gains a Breath Weapon with Strength 4 and the Flaming Attacks special rule.

items.name: Golden Lion
items.description: The bearer of this item and any unit they are with may re-roll failed Psychology tests.

items.name: Vermillion Quills
items.description: One use only. This item can be used at the start of close combat. The bearer of this item can re-roll all failed To Hit and To Wound rolls this turn.

items.name: Alchemist's Elixir of Iron Skin
items.description: One use only. This item can be used at the start of any phase. The character gains the Natural Armour save (3+) special rule until the end of the turn.

items.name: Alchemist's Elixir of Puissance
items.description: One use only. This item can be used at the start of any phase. The character gains +1 Strength and Attacks until the end of the turn.

items.name: Cloak of the Moon Wind
items.description: Model on foot only. The bearer of this item gains the Scouts special rule.

items.name: Alchemist's Elixir of Venom
items.description: One use only. This item can be used at the start of any phase. The character gains the Poisoned Attacks special rule until the end of the turn.

items.name: Flag of Grand Cathay
items.description: The bearer gains the Hold Your Ground (6) special rule. In addition, friendly units within 18" count as being in Harmony if within 6" of eligible Yin/Yang units rather than 3".

items.name: The Great Celestial Banner
items.description: The unit carrying this banner gains a 5+ Ward save.

items.name: Jade Banner
items.description: The unit carrying this banner gains +2 combat resolution bonus.

items.name: Standard of Wei Jin
items.description: The unit carrying this banner gains +1 to their Leadership, and enemy units in base contact suffer -1 to their Leadership.

items.name: Banner of Feng Shi
items.description: The unit carrying this banner gains the Immunity (Psychology) and Magical Attacks special rules.

items.name: Banner of the Empress' Eye
items.description: The unit carrying this banner gains +1 to Hit with missile weapons.

items.name: Banner of the Moon Empress
items.description: Infantry only. The unit carrying this banner gains the Scouts special rule.

items.name: Revered Banner of the Ancestors
items.description: The unit carrying this banner gains +1 Weapon Skill.

items.name: Serene Cloud Prayer Flag
items.description: The unit carrying this banner gains the Cold-blooded special rule.

items.name: Standard of Heavenly Fury
items.description: One use only. This item can be used at the start of any enemy Movement phase. Until the start of your next turn, no enemy unit within 24" of this banner can use the Fly special rule.

items.name: Banner of the Dragon's Wrath
items.description: Infantry only. The unit carrying this banner gains the Flaming Attacks and Impact Hits (1) special rules.

items.name: Standard of Shang-Yang
items.description: The unit carrying this banner may re-roll 1's when taking armour saves.

items.name: Dragon's Eye Banner
items.description: Whenever the unit carrying this standard is the target of an enemy spell, roll a D6. On a 3+, the enemy Wizard must choose another target. If no other target is available, the spell cannot be cast.

items.name: Bastion Standard
items.description: The unit carrying this banner only suffer half (rounding up) their normal Leadership penalty when taking Break tests and may re-roll failed Break tests.

items.name: Standard of Nan-Gau
items.description: The unit carrying this banner gains 6" to the range of their missile weapons.

items.name: Banner of Xen Wun
items.description: Enemy units cannot choose to Stand & Shoot against the unit carrying this banner.
